description: Debugger domain exposes JavaScript debugging capabilities. It allows setting and removing breakpoints, stepping through execution, exploring stack traces, etc.

properties.name: scriptId
properties.description: Script identifier as reported in the Debugger.scriptParsed.

properties.name: lineNumber
properties.description: Line number in the script.

properties.name: columnNumber
properties.description: Column number in the script.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Different kinds of breakpoint actions.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Data associated with this breakpoint type (e.g. for type "eval" this is the JavaScript string to evalulate).

properties.name: id
properties.description: A frontend-assigned identifier for this breakpoint action.

types.description: Action to perform when a breakpoint is triggered.

properties.name: condition
properties.description: Expression to use as a breakpoint condition. When specified, debugger will only stop on the breakpoint if this expression evaluates to true.

properties.name: actions
properties.description: Actions to perform automatically when the breakpoint is triggered.

properties.name: autoContinue
properties.description: Automatically continue after hitting this breakpoint and running actions.

properties.name: ignoreCount
properties.description: Number of times to ignore this breakpoint, before stopping on the breakpoint and running actions.

types.description: Extra options that modify breakpoint behavior.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Location of the function.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the function. Not present for anonymous functions.

properties.name: displayName
properties.description: Display name of the function(specified in 'displayName' property on the function object).

properties.name: scopeChain
properties.description: Scope chain for this closure.

properties.name: callFrameId
properties.description: Call frame identifier. This identifier is only valid while the virtual machine is paused.

properties.name: functionName
properties.description: Name of the JavaScript function called on this call frame.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Location in the source code.

properties.name: scopeChain
properties.description: Scope chain for this call frame.

properties.name: this
properties.description: this object for this call frame.

properties.name: isTailDeleted
properties.description: Is the current frame tail deleted from a tail call.

types.description: JavaScript call frame. Array of call frames form the call stack.

properties.name: object
properties.description: Object representing the scope. For global and with scopes it represents the actual object; for the rest of the scopes, it is artificial transient object enumerating scope variables as its properties.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Scope type.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name associated with the scope.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Location if available of the scope definition.

properties.name: empty
properties.description: Whether the scope has any variables.

types.description: A sample collected by evaluating a probe breakpoint action.

properties.name: probeId
properties.description: Identifier of the probe breakpoint action that created the sample.

properties.name: sampleId
properties.description: Unique identifier for this sample.

properties.name: batchId
properties.description: A batch identifier which is the same for all samples taken at the same breakpoint hit.

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: Timestamp of when the sample was taken.

properties.name: payload
properties.description: Contents of the sample.

types.description: The pause reason auxiliary data when paused because of an assertion.

properties.name: message
properties.description: The console.assert message string if provided.

types.description: The pause reason auxiliary data when paused because of hitting a breakpoint.

properties.name: breakpointId
properties.description: The identifier of the breakpoint causing the pause.

types.description: The pause reason auxiliary data when paused because of a Content Security Policy directive.

properties.name: directive
properties.description: The CSP directive that blocked script execution.

commands.name: enable
commands.description: Enables debugger for the given page. Clients should not assume that the debugging has been enabled until the result for this command is received.

commands.name: disable
commands.description: Disables debugger for given page.

commands.name: setAsyncStackTraceDepth
commands.description: Set the async stack trace depth for the page. A value of zero disables recording of async stack traces.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: Async stack trace depth.

commands.name: setBreakpointsActive

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: New value for breakpoints active state.

commands.description: Activates / deactivates all breakpoints on the page.

commands.name: setBreakpointByUrl

parameters.name: lineNumber
parameters.description: Line number to set breakpoint at.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the resources to set breakpoint on.

parameters.name: urlRegex
parameters.description: Regex pattern for the URLs of the resources to set breakpoints on. Either url or urlRegex must be specified.

parameters.name: columnNumber
parameters.description: Offset in the line to set breakpoint at.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options to apply to this breakpoint to modify its behavior.

returns.name: breakpointId
returns.description: Id of the created breakpoint for further reference.

returns.name: locations
returns.description: List of the locations this breakpoint resolved into upon addition.

commands.description: Sets JavaScript breakpoint at given location specified either by URL or URL regex. Once this command is issued, all existing parsed scripts will have breakpoints resolved and returned in locations property. Further matching script parsing will result in subsequent breakpointResolved events issued. This logical breakpoint will survive page reloads.

commands.name: setBreakpoint

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to set breakpoint in.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options to apply to this breakpoint to modify its behavior.

returns.name: breakpointId
returns.description: Id of the created breakpoint for further reference.

commands.description: Sets JavaScript breakpoint at a given location.

commands.name: removeBreakpoint
commands.description: Removes JavaScript breakpoint.

commands.name: continueUntilNextRunLoop
commands.description: Continues execution until the current evaluation completes. This will trigger either a Debugger.paused or Debugger.resumed event.

commands.name: continueToLocation
commands.description: Continues execution until specific location is reached. This will trigger either a Debugger.paused or Debugger.resumed event.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to continue to.

commands.name: stepOver
commands.description: Steps over the statement. This will trigger either a Debugger.paused or Debugger.resumed event.

commands.name: stepInto
commands.description: Steps into the function call. This will trigger either a Debugger.paused or Debugger.resumed event.

commands.name: stepOut
commands.description: Steps out of the function call. This will trigger either a Debugger.paused or Debugger.resumed event.

commands.name: pause
commands.description: Stops on the next JavaScript statement.

commands.name: resume
commands.description: Resumes JavaScript execution. This will trigger a Debugger.resumed event.

commands.name: searchInContent
commands.description: Searches for given string in script content.

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Id of the script to search in.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: String to search for.

parameters.name: caseSensitive
parameters.description: If true, search is case sensitive.

parameters.name: isRegex
parameters.description: If true, treats string parameter as regex.

commands.name: getScriptSource

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Id of the script to get source for.

commands.description: Returns source for the script with given id.

commands.name: getFunctionDetails

parameters.name: functionId
parameters.description: Id of the function to get location for.

commands.description: Returns detailed information on given function.

commands.name: setPauseOnExceptions
commands.description: Defines pause on exceptions state. Can be set to stop on all exceptions, uncaught exceptions or no exceptions. Initial pause on exceptions state is none.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Pause on exceptions mode.

commands.name: setPauseOnAssertions
commands.description: Set pause on assertions state. Assertions are console.assert assertions.

commands.name: evaluateOnCallFrame

parameters.name: callFrameId
parameters.description: Call frame identifier to evaluate on.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Expression to evaluate.

parameters.name: objectGroup
parameters.description: String object group name to put result into (allows rapid releasing resulting object handles using releaseObjectGroup).

parameters.name: includeCommandLineAPI
parameters.description: Specifies whether command line API should be available to the evaluated expression, defaults to false.

parameters.name: doNotPauseOnExceptionsAndMuteConsole
parameters.description: Specifies whether evaluation should stop on exceptions and mute console. Overrides setPauseOnException state.

parameters.name: returnByValue
parameters.description: Whether the result is expected to be a JSON object that should be sent by value.

parameters.name: generatePreview
parameters.description: Whether preview should be generated for the result.

parameters.name: saveResult
parameters.description: Whether the resulting value should be considered for saving in the $n history.

returns.name: result
returns.description: Object wrapper for the evaluation result.

returns.name: wasThrown
returns.description: True if the result was thrown during the evaluation.

returns.name: savedResultIndex
returns.description: If the result was saved, this is the $n index that can be used to access the value.

commands.description: Evaluates expression on a given call frame.

commands.name: setOverlayMessage

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Overlay message to display when paused in debugger.

commands.description: Sets overlay message.

events.name: globalObjectCleared
events.description: Called when global has been cleared and debugger client should reset its state. Happens upon navigation or reload.

events.name: scriptParsed

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Identifier of the script parsed.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the script parsed (if any).

parameters.name: startLine
parameters.description: Line offset of the script within the resource with given URL (for script tags).

parameters.name: startColumn
parameters.description: Column offset of the script within the resource with given URL.

parameters.name: endLine
parameters.description: Last line of the script.

parameters.name: endColumn
parameters.description: Length of the last line of the script.

parameters.name: isContentScript
parameters.description: Determines whether this script is a user extension script.

parameters.name: sourceURL
parameters.description: sourceURL name of the script (if any).

parameters.name: sourceMapURL
parameters.description: URL of source map associated with script (if any).

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: True if this script was parsed as a module.

events.description: Fired when virtual machine parses script. This event is also fired for all known and uncollected scripts upon enabling debugger.

events.name: scriptFailedToParse

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the script that failed to parse.

parameters.name: scriptSource
parameters.description: Source text of the script that failed to parse.

parameters.name: startLine
parameters.description: Line offset of the script within the resource.

parameters.name: errorLine
parameters.description: Line with error.

parameters.name: errorMessage
parameters.description: Parse error message.

events.description: Fired when virtual machine fails to parse the script.

events.name: breakpointResolved

parameters.name: breakpointId
parameters.description: Breakpoint unique identifier.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Actual breakpoint location.

events.description: Fired when breakpoint is resolved to an actual script and location.

events.name: paused

parameters.name: callFrames
parameters.description: Call stack the virtual machine stopped on.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Pause reason.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Object containing break-specific auxiliary properties.

parameters.name: asyncStackTrace
parameters.description: Linked list of asynchronous StackTraces.

events.description: Fired when the virtual machine stopped on breakpoint or exception or any other stop criteria.

events.name: resumed
events.description: Fired when the virtual machine resumed execution.

events.name: didSampleProbe
events.description: Fires when a new probe sample is collected.

parameters.name: sample
parameters.description: A collected probe sample.

events.name: playBreakpointActionSound
events.description: Fired when a "sound" breakpoint action is triggered on a breakpoint.

parameters.name: breakpointActionId
parameters.description: Breakpoint action identifier.
